Title: Establishes the power authority of the state of New York shall make low cost hydropower available to certain hospitals
Summary: Establishes the power authority of the state of New York shall make low cost hydropower available to hospitals and municipal housing authorities located within Niagara county.
LawCode: Amd ยง1005, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the power authority of the state of New York shall make low cost hydropower available to certain hospitals
